HeroSection.description: Looking for a secure alternative to pCloud? Internxt offers the first cloud storage with post quantum encryption and a full privacy suite of products for maximum privacy and security.

VersusSection.title: Internxt vs {{competitor}}
VersusSection.description: See why Internxt’s commitment to open-source transparency and independent audits makes it a more trustworthy and secure {{competitor}} alternative

features.title: Open-Source Code
features.description: As Internxt's code is open to everybody on GitHub, anyone may examine it and ensure its security. This transparency guarantees there are no hidden backdoors.

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Your data is encrypted client-side, which guarantees that only you can access it.

features.title: Fully audited
features.description: Internxt's services have been reviewed by security experts from a leading European penetration testing company. This ensures your data stays secure against external threats like hackers and breaches.

features.title: Proprietary software
features.description: The closed-source aspect of pCloud's code means only the company has access to it. You have no way to check what is happening with their data.

features.title: pCloud Crypto
features.description: This encryption feature is not open-source and is an extra-paid feature (free users are not protected). This brings to question its real security and transparency.

features.title: Password Storage Concerns
features.description: Without open-source verification, how can you be sure that pCloud does not save your password or that other people can't access it?

inxtTable.title: Security and privacy at no extra cost

features.title: Full protection

features.title: Pay extra for zero-knowledge encryption
features.description: You have to pay for the pCloud Crypto add-on to get private encryption.

features.title: Hidden costs
features.description: Although pCloud plans may seem affordable, the additional cost for an essential client-side encryption or additional download traffic can make it expensive.

features.title: Community-Driven Development
features.description: Because Internxt is open source, it can be improved through community contributions and frequent evaluations by security professionals.

features.title: No Secrets
features.description: Clear policies and open-source code ensure that there are no surprises.

features.title: Proprietary Software
features.description: pCloud is not transparent because it uses closed-source software

features.title: Trust Issues
features.description: Users have to trust pCloud blindly with their data without being able to check it.

features.title: Easy interface
features.description: Simple to use with a focus on security and privacy.

features.title: Cross-platform
features.description: Works on all major platforms, including WebDAV, and Rclone.

features.title: Multiple plans
features.description: Internxt offers family, business, and S3 object storage plans with API access for businesses and developers.

competitorTable.title: Additional features but at a price

features.title: Feature set

HorizontalScrollableSection.title: Is pCloud safe?
HorizontalScrollableSection.description: pCloud's closed-source encryption makes it difficult to verify its security effectiveness, raising concerns about accessing your files.

descriptions: A lot of pCloud users have received phishing emails from scammers. It's unclear how hackers got these emails, but pCloud denies a data breach.
Zero-knowledge encryption costs extra with pCloud Crypto. All users without it have significantly weaker protection. Without this additional encryption, pCloud can scan and access users' files.
Many pCloud users have reported their accounts being unfairly terminated and taken down without warning due to suspected trademark violations or illegal content.
pCloud uses trackers on its website (Facebook, Twitter, TikTok) to collect your data increasing the risk of privacy breaches and unwanted marketing

HorizontalScrollableSectionV2.title: Why should you choose Internxt as your pCloud alternative?
HorizontalScrollableSectionV2.description: Discover features of Internxt that make us a more secure, private pCloud alternative

descriptions: Internxt is an open-source alternative to pCloud, as the code for all our products and services is available on GitHub. Our commitment to data security guarantees transparency about how your data is handled and protected.
Internxt's services have been reviewed by security experts by a leading European penetration testing company. This ensures your data stays secure against external threats like hackers and breaches.

If you don’t want your data monitored to show personalized ads, then Internxt is a more private alternative to pCloud. We don’t use any trackers on our website that can review, monitor, or profit from your browsing.

Internxt operates with complete transparency, ensuring your data privacy is protected by European laws. Our GDPR compliance guarantees your information is handled securely and according to strict regulations.

Internxt includes post-quantum encryption, the most secure and advanced cryptography available for free and paid accounts. We only store the encrypted version of your data, and only you have the key to decrypt and access it.

Internxt Drive offers more paid plans and greater storage options than the pCloud pricing structure. If you need a pCloud alternative that offers annual and lifetime plans, choose from any of our affordable plans with VPN, Antivirus, Mail, Meet, and more.

faq.question: Is Internxt a more secure and private alternative to pCloud?
answer: Yes, Internxt offers more advanced features to protect your data without charging you extra for them. Post-quantum and zero-knowledge encryption guarantees nobody but you can view your files.

Additional features such as VPN, Antivirus, Device Cleaner, Dark Web Monitor, Meet, and Mail, features not currently available with pCloud, also offer you additional protection from hackers and data breaches.

faq.question: What is post-quantum encryption, and is it more secure?
answer: Unlike standard encryption, post-quantum encryption algorithms are built to resist powerful quantum attacks, making PQE a more secure pCloud alternative.
This cryptography method is used by Internxt to ensure that your lifetime cloud storage plan protects you against future cybersecurity threats and is available for all plans at no extra cost.

faq.question: Where is Internxt based?
answer: Internxt is based in Valencia, Spain, making it a GDPR compliant cloud storage solution that follows strict laws to ensure your data and privacy are protected.

faq.question: Is pCloud pricing more expensive than Internxt?
answer: With your exclusive 87% discount, all our plans are cheaper than pCloud pricing options currently available, with the benefit of offering many more features and privacy than pCloud.

faq.question: How do I contact support?
answer: If you have any more questions, requests, or need assistance, you can contact hello@internxt.com and our Customer Success Team will be happy to help.

faq.question: Can I add more storage to my lifetime plan?
answer: Yes, you can upgrade your plan from the settings of your Internxt account if you need to add more storage.

faq.question: Can I pay with credit card, PayPal, or cryptocurrency?
answer: Internxt currently accepts debit and credit cards (Mastercard, VISA, American Express, etc). You can also pay via PayPal, iDEAL, Sofort, and Cryptocurrency.
